revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Historical and Critical Memoirs of the general revolution in France, In the year 1789: From the opening of the States General, on the 25th April; 'till the framing..."
revision.text: Possibly: Historical and Critical Memoirs of the general revolution in France, In the year 1789: From the opening of the States General, on the 25th April; 'till the framing the Constitution, on the 6th August following. By John Talbot Dillon, Esq. B.S.R.E. Member of the Royal Academy of Sciences in Dublin.... ( London : Printed at the Logographic Press; and sold by Messrs. Robinsons, Paternoster-Row, P. Elmsly, Strand; W. Richardson, under the Royal Exchange; J. Edwards, Pall-Mall; and J. Walter, No. 169, Piccadilly., M.DCC.XC. [1790]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2511548~S1
